DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate method correlation and mean bias between six B-type natriuretic peptide (BNP) platforms.
DOC.brief_title: Alere Triage fs B-type Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) Method Comparison Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Samples with BNP range of 55000 pg/ml Samples with sufficient volume for testing BNP <5 pg/ml
